Title: List of Controlled Painters (Updating)
Text:
Sulian (Medium) - "Jinzhou Landscapes." Address: No. 5, South Taoyuan Vale (family blackmailed)
Mingyan (Low) - "Serenity of Xiehua Village." Address: No. 1, North Taoyuan Vale (needs shaking down)
Fuyun (Medium) - "Bittberry in Silent Night." Address: No 6, North Taoyuan Vale (needs closer squatting)
Shanlan (High) - "Springtime Repose," "The Essence of Bamboo." Address: Near Gubei Pass (not on the watchlist for now)
Shanchan (Low) - "Eight Sages Playing Weiqi." Address: No. 4, Xiehua Village (movement restricted for a while)
Jingmo (Medium) - "Tapestry of Rare Birds." Address: No. 4, Xiehua Village (under watch for a while)
Yingqing (Low) - "Rustic Life and Innocent Joy." Address: No. 9, Xiehua Village (give it 3 more days. May need to take them out)
